roleset.name: move something back and forth
roleset.note: FERRY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ferry' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 51.4.1 and 11.5, FRamenet entry Transportation. (from ferry.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: In fact, [Aer Lingus]-1 started [*-1]ferrying Russians from Shannon to New York when Washington stripped Aeroflot of its U.S. landing rights.
example.arg: when Washington stripped Aeroflot of its U.S. landing rights

example.name: often missing start point
example.text: The passenger railroad said it terminated some runs in Sacramento, relying on buses-2 [*-2] to ferry passengers to the Bay area.

example.name: merged locations
example.text: Mary ferried John between jail and the mental ward.
example.arg: between jail and the mental ward
